name: RMD-MP
savepath: Another big update coming your way! This update allows Terrorized monsters to drop from custom loot tables, expands the monster and item levels past 99, adds 3 new Forsaken Pacts and even includes a Rift Shop Rotation with some surprise goodies. Expect these 'Limit Break' systems to expand more in the next few updates, 99+ will be a journey. Enjoy the update!

The Sunder Mechanic and Terror Zones are now available via D2RHUD 1.1.2+. This will enable re-created features that mimic the official implementation, but with some slight upgrades and more planned improvements in the future. Please visit our discord for more details about how the systems work and info you might need as a mod author.
